programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep174
programme.desc: Achoo ! - Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sad Day with Blue - Blue's feeling sad, so we play Blue's Clues to figure out why. Along the way to figuring out Blue's Clues, we help our Felt Friends and Blues' friends from her school deal with emotions and feelings in different situations.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep915
programme.desc: Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf - When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Switcheroo / Protect The Egg - Professor Scratch's Switcheroo device causes chaos when Sir Steel uses it to get Deer Squad's Powers. // Rammy must learn to trust his friends when he chooses to take care of an abandoned egg, all while dealing with a mysterious ant invasion.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Lost Tickets - When Mommy loses her and Baby's tickets to the big Glow-J concert, they retrace her wake to track them down.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Treat Goblin / Baby Super Shark - Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Fixing Things - Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep175
programme.desc: The Giant Strawberry - When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep176
programme.desc: The Quiet Game - After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep128
programme.desc: The Statue of Friendship - Anna is inspired to create a statue of Froga but she runs out of clay. On her search to find more, she and her friends agree to each make their own special statues out of different materials. The best statue to build is one they build together!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Froga's Hat - Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep908
programme.desc: Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand - When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Save The Bees / Duck Dilemma - All the bees in the Central Forest are captured by Sir Steel for their honey and Deer Squad have to come to their rescue! // Kai invents a Roboduck to babysit the ducklings, but it goes haywire and takes down all the technology in Platinum City.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Rainbow Comet Rush - Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S03 Ep309
programme.desc: The Arctic Life! - Brrrr! The Arctic sure is cold-probably because it's filled with so many cool animals! After meeting Arctic Dan, Gil embarks on an icy expedition. With the Guppies' help, can Gil brave the elements to reach the North Pole?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Sleepy Singalong with Blue - It's a nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out Blue's favorite part of bedtime! As we search for clues, we help Blue and Polka Dots get clean, comfy, cozy and ready for bed.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Blue's Big Imagination - Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Curse of the Gold Falcon / The Island of Lost Things - Santiago and crew set sail to return the Golden Falcon idol back to it's rightful resting place. // When Santiago's magic sword is transported to the Island of Lost Things, the good pirates have to track it down by getting themselves lost!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Chicken Abuelo - Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Lost Tickets - When Mommy loses her and Baby's tickets to the big Glow-J concert, they retrace her wake to track them down.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Extreme Dodge Bubble - Vola puts it all on the line to win an epic game of Extreme Dodge Bubble.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep912
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost - When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. // Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and learns that it's not easy to help a ghost make new friends.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Paddington Feels the Music - It's the Windsor Gardens Parade & Paddington has to lead it when Ms. Potts gets injured. Can Simi help him find the beat?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Hide and Seek with Blue - Josh, Blue, and all our friends are playing Hide and Seek, and Blue knows the BEST hiding spot! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out the best place to hide, we search for our hiding friends and play Snail and Seek with Magenta and Blue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Catfish Capers / Bubble Debacle - Lola tries her hand at being the park keeper for the day (Ian is on holiday) but things do not go according to her plan. // Sir Steel's attempts to clean up the Central Forest with a giant soap machine creates a huge bubble nightmare!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste - Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Hiccupism / Silence please - Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Extreme Dodge Bubble / The Lost Tickets - Vola puts it all on the line to win an epic game of Extreme Dodge Bubble. // When Mommy loses her and Baby's tickets to the big Glow-J concert, they retrace her wake to track them down.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep153
programme.desc: Smile Day - When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep141
programme.desc: King for a Day - Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super Christopher - Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets - Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Toy Trouble! - The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! Only Blaze and Watts can stop the giant toys from making a giant mess!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // There’s a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pup Pup Boogie / Pups in a Fog - The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes. // Ryder and the PAW Patrol battle the clock to fix the lighthouse.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Every Cloud - Bobbi wants to spend time with Jade, but there are candy floss clouds to worry about first!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt - Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Paddington Earns a Ranger Badge - Jonathan and Paddington must get their Ranger badges but Mr. Curry is not happy with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a day’s cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she’s not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa’s friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232
programme.desc: Ice Skating - Peppa and George are going ice-skating for the first time. Mummy Pig teaches Peppa to skate and soon she is having lots of fun. Peppa begins to teach George how to skate but it turns out he is a natural born skater. Peppa and George love ice-skating.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Ultra Spy Tool! - When supervillain Dr. Coldfinger takes Curly Q's newest invention, the Ultra Spy Tool, Secret Agents Molly, Goby and Spy Pup must travel across the world to find and infiltrate his North Pole lair with regular tools to save the day!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Santiago and Bonnie to the Rescue / The Compass Caper - After getting stranded at the bottom of a crevice, Bonnie and Santiago must team up to save the day. // Santiago is on a mad dash to get his compass back after it's nabbed by Bonnie Bones and Sir Butterscotch.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Trojan Sea Horse - Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day - Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Pups on Ice / Pups and the Snow Monster - Ryder and the PAW Patrol need to rescue Alex on Jakes mountain. // The pups find strange footprints in the snow on the mountain outside Adventure Bay. Everyone thinks it’s a “snow monster” and it’s scaring the skiers away.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep85
programme.desc: I Spy - The voice trumpet leads a game of 'I Spy' where the Teletubbies have to spot different colours - purple, green, yellow and red. What or who can they spot with those colours?

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S4) Ep10
programme.desc: Shorts - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shorts' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of shorts - red shorts, stripy shorts, kick it really far shorts and flamingo shorts!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: The Amazing Fence - The Blockers are building a fence, but they accidentally create a maze. With one Blocker lost inside, can Team Tinpo help him find a way out?

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep20
programme.desc: It's Time to Make Ice Lollies - On a hot summer day, JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends are painting the fence around the community garden. JoJo and Gran Gran decide to buy ice lollies from Jared's shop, only to find he has run out!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: Fix It Mum and Dad - Monty believes that parents can fix everything, until he is told by his parents that they cannot fix his toy helicopter.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep42
programme.desc: Fun Factory - Monty ponders why fun activities must end, when he and Jimmy Jones are told by Stan their time playing at the park for the day is finished.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: The Space Badge - Duggee teaches the squirrels all about the stars, the planets and the Milky Way!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: The Spooky Badge - The Squirrels are playing dress up when they hear a ghostly sound. What is going on?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep26
programme.desc: The Obstacle Course Badge - It's time for the annual Animal Obstacle Course Race, and the animals must work together in teams to complete the course. Let the fun begin!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep50
programme.desc: The Paddy Fields of China - The Go Jetters swing into action when they discover that Glitch is using real landmarks for his crazy golf course.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: The Nazca Lines, Peru - The Go Jetters race to protect ancient artwork in Peru, when Glitch erases the Nazca Lines.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep40
programme.desc: Octopus - When Chloe tries to teach her dad to improvise and play Bluey's game of Octopus at home, he finds it hard to understand or enjoy, until they both realize they can play it their own way.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: Bad Mood - Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Andy and the Naked Mole Rat - Andy jets off to the Sahara Desert, in Africa, in search of a naked mole rat.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Grasses - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how grasses play such an important role in the environment.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Back - In this episode Captain Captain returns to her beloved Scarlet Squid (much to the surprise of Gem) and has brought along two brand new pirates, Sandy and Seaweed, to help win those jewels back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep25
programme.desc: The Going Slow Badge - Duggee shows the squirrels how to enjoy things at a slower pace, but things change when they bump into Tortoise who needs to get to the hospital as his wife is having babies!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: The Memory Badge - Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he's lost it! The squirrels start to look for it but they can't find it anywhere. It's time to think carefully and remember.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: The Theatre Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help to put on an amateur dramatic show, but no-one can agree on whether it should be all-singing, all-dancing extravaganza or a serious drama.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep48
programme.desc: The Jigokudani Monkey Park, Japan - The Go Jetters fly to the rescue in Japan, as Glitch gets up to his usual monkey business.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep47
programme.desc: The Blue Mountains, Jamaica - Trouble brews in Jamaica when Glitch's campfire threatens a coffee plantation.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep2
programme.desc: Toby and Bash - Bash is rewarded by the Fat Controller for being a Really Useful Engine. His prize is to spend the day with Toby. Bash enjoys himself so much that Toby thinks his friend would like to live on Sodor.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep40
programme.desc: Duck Flies - Duck sees some flying, migrating ducks in the sky and decides he would like to try it too.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep39
programme.desc: Bug Bop - Bug and his friends lead Sarah & Duck to their outdoor music concert.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Moon Path - On a cloudless night, Nelly and Nora help Mrs. Bonner search for her cat Morris.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Dog Loves Calm - Dog and Pug escape a very noisy Bookshop to find Granny Pug who is leading a mediation retreat. They are trying to find a peaceful spot.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep40
programme.desc: Techno Monty - Monty wonders why some people like Jeanie prefer playing a game against the computer rather than playing in real-life with friends.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: The Thing That Blew - The gang chase a feather blowing about on the wind until it blows away, and then they invent a new game.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: On The Bright Side - Kid Po Bo has created an awesome city garden - but he may not have chosen the best location. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Puzzlin' Tool Wall - Logi-Po's tools fit neatly on the wall - so, when Doug-Po knocks them down, can the rest of the team put everything back together?

programme.title: Bluey (S2) Ep38
programme.desc: Double Babysitter - When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: The Shadow Badge - There has been a power cut, but luckily Duggee has torches for everybody and the squirrels use them to make shadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, and the squirrels are inspired to make their own collections and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Bioluminescent Bay, Puerto Rico - Glitch's bath time puts the creatures of Puerto Rico's Bioluminescent Bay in bubble-trouble.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep45
programme.desc: The Gobi Desert, Mongolia - Glitch's giant drill causes a dino-disaster for the team's fossil hunt in the Gobi Desert.

programme.desc: Numpup Nursery - The Numpups are babysitting the Flamingo's five eggs while they play Flamingo Bingo. What could go wrong?

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 31 - Sophie Thomson visits an Adelaide garden inspired by royalty; Costa Georgiadis explores the wildflowers around Sydney; Tino Carnevale shares some soil wisdom; Millie shows you can plant into pretty much anything.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Hunting Ground, Tas Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Dale and Michael embark on a project to restore two 19th Century timber cottages on their Tasmanian rural property. Will they accomplish their dream?

programme.title: Food Safari Earth - Legumes Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Protein-rich beans have always been the heavy lifters of the vegetable world, Maeve O'Meara pays tribute to the power of pulses and legumes with chefs Faysal El-Abd, Daisy Rajan, Joao Cadete, plus Attila Yilmaz.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep3
programme.desc: The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories, and now there's a new way to stay in touch with what's going on. Tahlea Aualiitia presents the latest news and information from the region's most trusted reporters.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep60
programme.desc: Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News Hour Ep80
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the latest news and the day's top stories, with reporters on the ground to tell you what's happening and why it matters.

programme.title: The Drum Ep65
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep80
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Karina Carvalho.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 6 - Fremantle v Western Bulldogs Ep31
programme.desc: Round 6 of the AFL Season kicks off in the west as the Fremantle Dockers host the Western Bulldogs in Friday Night Footy. Both teams lost their opening two matches of 2023 and need to turn it around quickly to make finals.

programme.title: The World Ep80
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: India Now Ep1
programme.desc: A rich and entertaining look at news, culture and politics from India and the subcontinent. Marc Fennell is joined by Avani Dias and guests for a new season exploring everything that makes South Asia the region to watch.

programme.title: Miriam Margolyes: Australia Unmasked Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Starting in Tasmania, Miriam Margolyes is confronted with the complexities of Tasmania's rich history. She navigates these confronting themes all while meeting those still fighting for a 'fair go'.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep12
programme.desc: In April the Reserve Bank kept rates on hold after ten consecutive interest rate rises. Will the RBA's pause continue in May as we wait to see if inflation has peaked? Or is there more pain in store for mortgage borrowers?

programme.title: The World Ep80
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch Ep11
programme.desc: Join Michael Rowland, Madeleine Morris, Emma Rebellato, Tony Armstrong and Nate Byrne for some of the best conversations as we hear from some of the most informed and entertaining guests who have appeared on News Breakfast.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep16
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote and finance with David Chau.

programme.title: ABC News Ep32
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep14
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.desc: We break down a print that warps space to allow the viewer to be in two places at once: Shinobazu Pond, known for its lotus flowers, and the Sumida River, one of Edo's busiest waterways.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Prelims - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
programme.desc: Prelims - With five consecutive victories, including back-to-back finishes of Raphael Assuncao and Jack Shore, Ricky Simon put himself on the fast track to a shot at the bantamweight title, but on April 29, he will have to make his case even stronger by getting past Chinese contender Song Yadong in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Winner of three of his last four, with knockouts of Julio Arce and Marlon Moraes, Song can change the direction of a fight with one punch, and he plans on letting Simon know that as soon as the Octagon door shuts
